3 import numpy as np

8 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import SetBool, SetBoolRequest, SetString, SetStringRequest
9 from niryo_robot_vision.srv import (ActivateDebugTopics,
10  DebugColorDetection,
11  DebugColorDetectionRequest,
12  DebugMarkers,
13  DebugMarkersRequest,

16  ObjDetectionResponse,

21 # Messages
22 from sensor_msgs.msg import CompressedImage, CameraInfo
23 from std_msgs.msg import Bool
24 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus, ObjectPose
25 from niryo_robot_vision.msg import ActiveDebugTopics, ImageParameters
26 
27 # Packages
28 from niryo_robot_utils import sentry_init
29 from niryo_robot_vision.business.enums import ObjectShape, ObjectColor
30 from niryo_robot_vision.business import image_processing, markers, colors
31 from niryo_robot_vision.implem.abstract_stream import AbstractStream
32 from niryo_robot_vision.implem import built_in_camera, client_stream
33 
34 
35 class VisionNode:
36 
37  def __init__(self):
38 
39  self.__camera_port = rospy.get_param('~camera_port')
40  self.__stream_compression_quality = rospy.get_param('~stream_compression_quality')
41  self.__debug_compression_quality = rospy.get_param('~debug_compression_quality')
42 
43  camera_intrinsics = rospy.get_param('~cam_intrinsics')
44  frame_rate = rospy.get_param('~frame_rate')
45 
46  camera_config = built_in_camera.CameraConfig(mtx=np.array(camera_intrinsics['mtx']),
47  dist=np.array(camera_intrinsics['dist']),
48  flip=rospy.get_param('~flip_img'),
49  width_img=camera_intrinsics['width_img'],
50  height_img=camera_intrinsics['height_img'],
51  acquisition_rate=frame_rate)
52  self.__webcam_stream = built_in_camera.Stream(
53  camera_index=self.__camera_port,
54  config=camera_config,
55  publish_frame_cb=self.__publish_compressed_stream,
56  )
57  self.__client_stream = client_stream.Stream(
58  rospy.get_param('~client_stream_topic'),
59  publish_frame_cb=self.__publish_compressed_stream,
60  )
61 
62  if self.__webcam_stream.is_available:
63  self.__source = 'webcam'
64  self.__webcam_stream.start()
65  else:
66  self.__source = 'client'
67  self.__client_stream.start()
68 
69  self.__camera_intrinsics_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~camera_intrinsics', CameraInfo, latch=True, queue_size=1)
70  self.__camera_intrinsics_publisher.publish(
71  CameraInfo(
72  K=camera_config.mtx.flatten().tolist(),
73  D=camera_config.dist.flatten().tolist(),
74  ))
75 
76  # == Ros interface == #
77 
78  # Main stream
79  self.__compressed_stream_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~compressed_video_stream', CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
80  self.__stream_active_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~video_stream_is_active', Bool, queue_size=2)
81 
82  # Stream editing
83  rospy.Service('~start_stop_video_streaming', SetBool, self.__callback_start_stop)
84  rospy.Service('~set_source', SetString, self.__callback_set_source)
85  rospy.Service('~set_saturation', SetImageParameter, self.__callback_set_saturation)
86  rospy.Service('~set_brightness', SetImageParameter, self.__callback_set_brightness)
87  rospy.Service('~set_contrast', SetImageParameter, self.__callback_set_contrast)
88  self.__stream_parameters_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~video_stream_parameters',
89  ImageParameters,
90  queue_size=2,
91  latch=True)
92 
93  # Debug features
94  self.__red_channel_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~debug/red_channel', CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
95  self.__green_channel_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~debug/green_channel', CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
96  self.__blue_channel_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~debug/blue_channel', CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
97  self.__any_channel_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~debug/any_channel', CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
98  self.__markers_publisher = rospy.Publisher('~debug/markers', CompressedImage, queue_size=1)
99  self.__active_debug_topics = rospy.Publisher('~debug/active_topics',
100  ActiveDebugTopics,
101  queue_size=1,
102  latch=True)
103  # dict to keep track of what debug topics are activated, and what method to call to get the image
104  self.__activated_debug_publishers = {
105  self.__red_channel_publisher: {
106  'is_active': False,
107  'publish_method': lambda: self.__get_image_channel_as_msg(ObjectColor.RED),
108  },
109  self.__green_channel_publisher: {
110  'is_active': False,
111  'publish_method': lambda: self.__get_image_channel_as_msg(ObjectColor.GREEN),
112  },
113  self.__blue_channel_publisher: {
114  'is_active': False,
115  'publish_method': lambda: self.__get_image_channel_as_msg(ObjectColor.BLUE),
116  },
117  self.__any_channel_publisher: {
118  'is_active': False,
119  'publish_method': lambda: self.__get_image_channel_as_msg(ObjectColor.ANY),
120  },
121  self.__markers_publisher: {
122  'is_active': False,
123  'publish_method': lambda: self.__get_image_w_markers_as_msg()[1],
124  },
125  }
126  rospy.Service('~debug_markers', DebugMarkers, self.__callback_debug_markers)
127  rospy.Service('~debug_colors', DebugColorDetection, self.__callback_debug_color)
128  rospy.Service('~debug/activate', ActivateDebugTopics, self.__callback_activate_debug)
129 
130  # Object detection
131  rospy.Service('~obj_detection_rel', ObjDetection, self.__callback_get_obj_relative_pose)
132 
133  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / rospy.get_param('~is_active_rate')), self.__publish_is_active)
134  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / frame_rate), self.__publish_debug_topics_callback)
135 
136  # Set a bool to mentioned this node is initialized
137  rospy.set_param('~initialized', True)
138 
139  rospy.loginfo('Vision Node - Initialized')
140 
141  @property
142  def __stream(self) -> AbstractStream:
143  """
144  Return the selected stream.
145  :return:
146  """
147  return {
148  'webcam': self.__webcam_stream,
149  'client': self.__client_stream,
150  }[self.__source]
151 
152  # - CALLBACK
153  def __callback_get_obj_relative_pose(self, req: ObjDetectionRequest):
154  """
155  Callback to get the relative pose of an object detected in the image.
156  :param req: The request containing the object color and type
157  :return: The response containing the object relative x, y and yaw and its shape and color
158  """
159  try:
160  found_object = image_processing.detect_object(self.__stream.image,
161  ObjectColor[req.obj_color],
162  ObjectShape[req.obj_type],
163  req.workspace_ratio)
164  except image_processing.MarkersNotFoundError:
165  return CommandStatus.MARKERS_NOT_FOUND, None, None, None, None
166  except image_processing.NoShapeFoundError:
167  return CommandStatus.OBJECT_NOT_FOUND, None, None, None, None
168 
169  return ObjDetectionResponse(
170  status=CommandStatus.SUCCESS,
171  obj_pose=ObjectPose(x=found_object.x, y=found_object.y, yaw=found_object.yaw),
172  obj_type=found_object.shape.name,
173  obj_color=found_object.color.name,
174  )
175 
176  def __callback_debug_markers(self, _: DebugMarkersRequest):
177  """
178  Callback to get the image with the markers drawn on it.
179  :param _: The request
180  :return: The response containing the image
181  """
182  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully got debug markers', *self.__get_image_w_markers_as_msg()
183 
184  def __callback_debug_color(self, req: DebugColorDetectionRequest):
185  """
186  Callback to get the image with the specified color channel.
187  :param req: The request containing the color channel
188  :return: The response containing the image
189  """
190  try:
191  color = ObjectColor[req.color]
192  except image_processing.NoShapeFoundError:
193  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, f'Invalid color. Possible values are {[c.name for c in ObjectColor]}', None
194  try:
195  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully got debug colors', self.__get_image_channel_as_msg(color)
196  except Exception as e:
197  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, f'Failed to get debug colors: {e}', None
198 
199  def __callback_activate_debug(self, req: ActivateDebugTopicsRequest):
200  self.__activated_debug_publishers[self.__red_channel_publisher]['is_active'] = req.topics.red_channel
201  self.__activated_debug_publishers[self.__green_channel_publisher]['is_active'] = req.topics.green_channel
202  self.__activated_debug_publishers[self.__blue_channel_publisher]['is_active'] = req.topics.blue_channel
203  self.__activated_debug_publishers[self.__any_channel_publisher]['is_active'] = req.topics.any_channel
204  self.__activated_debug_publishers[self.__markers_publisher]['is_active'] = req.topics.markers
205 
206  self.__active_debug_topics.publish(req.topics)
207  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Successfully updated the debug topics'
208 
209  def __callback_start_stop(self, req: SetBoolRequest):
210  """
211  Callback to start or stop the video stream.
212  :param req: The request containing the desired state
213  :return: The response indicating success or failure
214  """
215  if req.value is True:
216  try:
217  self.__stream.start()
218  except RuntimeError:
219  return True, 'Stream already started'
220  self.__stream_active_publisher.publish(Bool(data=True))
221  return True, 'Video stream started'
222  else:
223  try:
224  self.__stream.stop()
225  except RuntimeError:
226  return True, 'Stream already stopped'
227  self.__stream_active_publisher.publish(Bool(data=False))
228  return True, 'Video stream stopped'
229 
230  def __callback_set_source(self, req: SetStringRequest):
231  if req.value not in ['webcam', 'client']:
232  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, 'Invalid source. Possible values are [webcam, client]'
233 
234  try:
235  self.__stream.stop()
236  except RuntimeError:
237  pass
238 
239  self.__source = req.value
240  self.__stream.start()
241 
242  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, f'Source set successfully set to {req.value}'
243 
244  def __callback_set_saturation(self, req: SetImageParameterRequest):
245  """
246  Callback to set the saturation of the image stream.
247  :param req: The request containing the saturation factor
248  :return: The response indicating success or failure
249  """
250  self.__stream.saturation = req.factor
251  self.__stream_parameters_publisher.publish(
252  ImageParameters(brightness_factor=self.__stream.brightness,
253  contrast_factor=self.__stream.contrast,
254  saturation_factor=self.__stream.saturation))
255  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Saturation set successfully'
256 
257  def __callback_set_brightness(self, req: SetImageParameterRequest):
258  """
259  Callback to set the brightness of the image stream.
260  :param req: The request containing the brightness factor
261  :return: The response indicating success or failure
262  """
263  self.__stream.brightness = req.factor
264  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Brightness set successfully'
265 
266  def __callback_set_contrast(self, req: SetImageParameterRequest):
267  """
268  Callback to set the contrast of the image stream.
269  :param req: The request containing the contrast factor
270  :return: The response indicating success or failure
271  """
272  self.__stream.contrast = req.factor
273  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Contrast set successfully'
274 
275  def __publish_is_active(self, _: rospy.timer.TimerEvent):
276  """
277  Publish the is_active parameter.
278  :param _: The timer event
279  """
280  self.__stream_active_publisher.publish(Bool(data=self.__stream.is_active))
281 
282  def __publish_compressed_stream(self, frame: np.ndarray):
283  """
284  Publish the compressed image stream. This callback is called by the stream when a new frame is available.
285  :param frame: The frame to publish
286  :type frame: numpy.ndarray
287  """
288  self.__compressed_stream_publisher.publish(self.__generate_msg_from_frame(frame))
289 
290  def __publish_debug_topics_callback(self, _: rospy.timer.TimerEvent):
291  """
292  Publish the debug topics. To reduce the load on the CPU, we only publish (and thus computing the images) on the
293  debug topics if there is at least one subscriber.
294  :param _: The timer event
295  """
296  for publisher, topic_info in self.__activated_debug_publishers.items():
297  if not topic_info['is_active']:
298  continue
299  try:
300  publisher.publish(topic_info['publish_method']())
301  except Exception as e:
302  rospy.logerr(f'Failed to publish debug topic {publisher.resolved_name}: {e}')
303 
304  def __generate_msg_from_frame(self, frame, compression_quality: float = None) -> CompressedImage:
305  """
306  Generate a CompressedImage message from a frame. It encodes the image in JPEG format.
307  :param frame: The frame to compress
308  :param compression_quality: The compression quality to use. If None, use the classical stream value.
309  The value must be between 0 and 100.
310  :return: The CompressedImage message
311  """
312  if compression_quality is None:
313  compression_quality = self.__stream_compression_quality
314 
315  _, encoded_img = cv2.imencode('.jpg', frame, [int(cv2.IMWRITE_JPEG_QUALITY), compression_quality])
316  msg = CompressedImage()
317  msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
318  msg.format = 'jpg'
319  msg.data = encoded_img.tobytes()
320  return msg
321 
322  def __get_image_channel_as_msg(self, color: ObjectColor) -> CompressedImage:
323  """
324  Get the image with the specified color channel and return it as a CompressedImage message.
325  :param color: The color channel to get
326  :return: The CompressedImage message
327  """
328  return self.__generate_msg_from_frame(
329  colors.filter_channel(self.__stream.image, color),
330  compression_quality=self.__debug_compression_quality,
331  )
332 
333  def __get_image_w_markers_as_msg(self) -> (bool, CompressedImage):
334  """
335  Get the image with the markers drawn on it and return it as a CompressedImage message.
336  :return: A tuple containing a boolean indicating if the markers were found and the CompressedImage message
337  """
338  found, frame = markers.draw_markers(self.__stream.image)
339  return found, self.__generate_msg_from_frame(
340  frame,
341  compression_quality=self.__debug_compression_quality,
342  )
343 
344 
345 if __name__ == '__main__':
346  sentry_init()
347 
348  rospy.init_node('niryo_robot_vision', anonymous=False, log_level=rospy.INFO)
349 
350  try:
351  vision_node = VisionNode()
352  rospy.spin()
353  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
354  pass
